mapper.insert: insert into corporation(corporationmember_id, corporationmember_name, corporationmember_passwd,corporationmember_email, corporation_name, corporation_location, corporationmember_phone,corporation_url,corporation_photo,corporation_registration, corporation_registrationpdf,corporation_intro, corporation_verified) values (#{corporationMemberId},#{corporationMemberName},#{corporationMemberPasswd},#{corporationMemberEmail}, #{corporationName},#{corporationLocation},#{corporationMemberPhone},#{corporationUrl},#{corporationPhoto}, #{corporationRegistration}, #{corporationRegistrationPdf},#{corporationIntro}, #{corporationVerified} )
